		<title>Zannou, Gely, Morena, Mare Nostrum Team for ‘I Spit on Your Graves’</title>
		<link>http://variety.com/2016/film/global/zannou-gely-morena-mare-nostrum-i-spit-on-your-graves-1201773602/</link>
		<comments>http://variety.com/2016/film/global/zannou-gely-morena-mare-nostrum-i-spit-on-your-graves-1201773602/#respond</comments>

		<category><![CDATA[Festivals]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[Global]]></category>

		<category><![CDATA[Mare Nostrum Productions]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[Morena Films]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[Santiago Zannou]]></category>

		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://variety.com/?p=1201773602</guid>
		<description>CANNES —  Cyril Gely, scribe of Omar Sy hit “Chocolat,” is adapting U.S.-set thriller “I Spit on Your Graves,” the celebrated American race relations/revenge novel that made and killed -literally &#8211; French literary legend Boris Vian, a friend of Duke Ellington and Charlie Parker. Set in a contemporary Southern U.S., to be shot in English,“I...  <a href="http://variety.com/2016/film/global/zannou-gely-morena-mare-nostrum-i-spit-on-your-graves-1201773602/" title="Read Zannou, Gely, Morena, Mare Nostrum Team for ‘I Spit on Your Graves’">Read more &#187;</a><img alt="" border="0" src="http://pixel.wp.com/b.gif?host=variety.com&#038;blog=43439658&#038;post=1201773602&#038;subd=pmcvariety&#038;ref=&#038;feed=1" width="1" height="1" /><div class="feedflare">

</div></description>

		<item>
		<title>IMAX Strikes Theater Mega Deal With China’s JinYi Media</title>
		<link>http://variety.com/2016/biz/asia/imax-theater-china-jinyi-media-1201773601/</link>
		<comments>http://variety.com/2016/biz/asia/imax-theater-china-jinyi-media-1201773601/#respond</comments>

		<category><![CDATA[JinYi]]></category>

		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://variety.com/?p=1201773601</guid>
		<description>In one of the largest deals in its history, IMAX has signed an agreement to supply 40 new theaters in China to Guangzhou JinYi Media Corp. Making the agreement more significant, the deal is struck on full revenue-sharing terms. The new theaters will be added to existing cinema projects and be largely installed by 2018...  <a href="http://variety.com/2016/biz/asia/imax-theater-china-jinyi-media-1201773601/" title="Read IMAX Strikes Theater Mega Deal With China&#8217;s JinYi Media">Read more &#187;</a><img alt="" border="0" src="http://pixel.wp.com/b.gif?host=variety.com&#038;blog=43439658&#038;post=1201773601&#038;subd=pmcvariety&#038;ref=&#038;feed=1" width="1" height="1" /><div class="feedflare">

		<item>
		<title>Nikolaj Coster-Waldau, Greg Kinnear, Emma Roberts to Star in ‘Spinning Man’</title>
		<link>http://variety.com/2016/film/news/nikolaj-coster-waldau-greg-kinnear-emma-roberts-spinning-man-1201772121/</link>
		<comments>http://variety.com/2016/film/news/nikolaj-coster-waldau-greg-kinnear-emma-roberts-spinning-man-1201772121/#respond</comments>

		<category><![CDATA[News]]></category>

		<category><![CDATA[Spinning Man]]></category>

		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://variety.com/?p=1201772121</guid>
		<description>Nikolaj Coster-Waldau, Greg Kinnear and Emma Roberts will star in the psychological thriller &#8220;Spinning Man.&#8221; The project &#8212; set to begin production next month in Minnesota &#8212; will mark the American debut of Danish filmmaker Peter Flinth, who will direct from a script by Matthew Aldrich based on George Harrar&#8217;s novel. Keith Arnold will produce...  <a href="http://variety.com/2016/film/news/nikolaj-coster-waldau-greg-kinnear-emma-roberts-spinning-man-1201772121/" title="Read Nikolaj Coster-Waldau, Greg Kinnear, Emma Roberts to Star in &#8216;Spinning Man&#8217;">Read more &#187;</a><img alt="" border="0" src="http://pixel.wp.com/b.gif?host=variety.com&#038;blog=43439658&#038;post=1201772121&#038;subd=pmcvariety&#038;ref=&#038;feed=1" width="1" height="1" /><div class="feedflare">

		<item>
		<title>Of Course China Has Its Own Amazon Echo Clone</title>
		<link>http://variety.com/2016/digital/news/jd-dingdong-amazon-echo-1201773585/</link>
		<comments>http://variety.com/2016/digital/news/jd-dingdong-amazon-echo-1201773585/#respond</comments>
		<pubDate>Fri, 13 May 2016 04:14:10 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[Janko Roettgers]]></dc:creator>

		<category><![CDATA[News]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[Amazon Echo]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[CES Asia 2016]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[JD.com]]></category>

		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://variety.com/?p=1201773585</guid>
		<description>Looks like Google isn&#8217;t the only company that&#8217;s been inspired by the success of Amazon&#8217;s Echo loudspeaker. Chinese e-commerce giant JD.com also took some cues from the Echo in developing DingDong, its very own smart loudspeaker. DingDong, which was first announced in China  a year ago and has been available for sale there for a few months now, looks...  <a href="http://variety.com/2016/digital/news/jd-dingdong-amazon-echo-1201773585/" title="Read Of Course China Has Its Own Amazon Echo Clone">Read more &#187;</a><img alt="" border="0" src="http://pixel.wp.com/b.gif?host=variety.com&#038;blog=43439658&#038;post=1201773585&#038;subd=pmcvariety&#038;ref=&#038;feed=1" width="1" height="1" /><div class="feedflare">

</div></description>

		<item>
		<title>Japan’s ‘Production Committee’ Filmmaking Has Critics Grousing About Groupthink</title>
		<link>http://variety.com/2016/film/asia/japan-production-committee-filmmaking-low-quality-1201771415/</link>
		<comments>http://variety.com/2016/film/asia/japan-production-committee-filmmaking-low-quality-1201771415/#respond</comments>
		<pubDate>Fri, 13 May 2016 04:00:32 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[David S. Cohen]]></dc:creator>
				<category><![CDATA[Film]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[Asia]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[Spotlight]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[Adam Torel]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[Cannes Film Festival]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[Gaga]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[Japan]]></category>

		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://variety.com/?p=1201771415</guid>
		<description>Social media was abuzz in April after producer and distributor Adam Torel of Third Window Films told the Sankei Shimbun newspaper that the quality of movies made in Japan had fallen low. One of his points was that the so-called “production committee” system, whereby multiple partners invest in a film project, results in a highly...  <a href="http://variety.com/2016/film/asia/japan-production-committee-filmmaking-low-quality-1201771415/" title="Read Japan&#8217;s &#8216;Production Committee&#8217; Filmmaking Has Critics Grousing About Groupthink">Read more &#187;</a><img alt="" border="0" src="http://pixel.wp.com/b.gif?host=variety.com&#038;blog=43439658&#038;post=1201771415&#038;subd=pmcvariety&#038;ref=&#038;feed=1" width="1" height="1" /><div class="feedflare">

</div></description>

		<item>
		<title>Michael Bay to Develop Biopic on Drone Warfare Fighter (EXCLUSIVE)</title>
		<link>http://variety.com/2016/film/news/michael-bay-drone-warfare-movie-brett-velicovich-1201772649/</link>
		<comments>http://variety.com/2016/film/news/michael-bay-drone-warfare-movie-brett-velicovich-1201772649/#comments</comments>
		<pubDate>Fri, 13 May 2016 04:00:31 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[Maane Khatchatourian]]></dc:creator>
				<category><![CDATA[Film]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[News]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[Bay Films]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[Brett Velicovich]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[Michael Bay]]></category>

		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://variety.com/?p=1201772649</guid>
		<description>Michael Bay’s production company Bay Films is developing the action-packed biopic of former U.S. Army Delta Force fighter and drone warfare expert Brett Velicovich for Paramount Pictures. The true story of how the Iraq War vet and onetime U.S. intelligence specialist used his drone skills to fight terrorists contains never-before-revealed details about ISIS’s rise to...  <a href="http://variety.com/2016/film/news/michael-bay-drone-warfare-movie-brett-velicovich-1201772649/" title="Read Michael Bay to Develop Biopic on Drone Warfare Fighter (EXCLUSIVE)">Read more &#187;</a><img alt="" border="0" src="http://pixel.wp.com/b.gif?host=variety.com&#038;blog=43439658&#038;post=1201772649&#038;subd=pmcvariety&#038;ref=&#038;feed=1" width="1" height="1" /><div class="feedflare">

		<title>‘The Red Turtle’ Pulls Studio Ghibli Out of Its Shell</title>

		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://variety.com/?p=1201771413</guid>
		<description>The dual geniuses behind Studio Ghibli, Japan’s most revered animation company, aren’t getting any younger. At age 75, “Spirited Away” director Hayao Miyazaki has all but retired, now focusing exclusively on short films, while “The Tale of the Princess Kaguya” was 80-year-old Isao Takahata’s final feature. That puts the studio in urgent need of younger...  <a href="http://variety.com/2016/film/festivals/the-red-turtle-studio-ghibli-michael-dudok-de-wit-co-prodution-1201771413/" title="Read ‘The Red Turtle’ Pulls Studio Ghibli Out of Its Shell">Read more &#187;</a><img alt="" border="0" src="http://pixel.wp.com/b.gif?host=variety.com&#038;blog=43439658&#038;post=1201771413&#038;subd=pmcvariety&#038;ref=&#038;feed=1" width="1" height="1" /><div class="feedflare">

		<description>Kleber Mendoca Filho’s “Aquarius,” (pictured) which plays in Cannes’s 2016 competition, is a sign of Brazil’s buildup as a player whose films are forging more links abroad and being released in overseas theaters. “Aquarius,” produced by Recife’s CineScopio and Said Ben Said’s Paris-based SBS Prods., is set for an Oct. 17 release in France. “When...  <a href="http://variety.com/2016/film/festivals/brazil-films-get-boost-from-state-aid-1201772955/" title="Read Brazil Films Get Boost From State Aid">Read more &#187;</a><img alt="" border="0" src="http://pixel.wp.com/b.gif?host=variety.com&#038;blog=43439658&#038;post=1201772955&#038;subd=pmcvariety&#038;ref=&#038;feed=1" width="1" height="1" /><div class="feedflare">

		<description>Cannes Film Festival chief Thierry Frémaux was concerned enough about Laurent Lafitte&#8217;s rape joke on opening night that he immediately approached Allen after the ceremony to make sure he wasn&#8217;t offended. The director told him he&#8217;s actually a fan of &#8220;provocative&#8221; humor. Mundial, IM Global/Canana&#8217;s joint sales venture, is pre-selling...  <a href="http://variety.com/2016/film/festivals/canana-telefonica-diego-lunas-black-minutes-1201772501/" title="Read Canana, Telefonica Team On Diego Luna’s ’Black Minutes’">Read more &#187;</a><img alt="" border="0" src="http://pixel.wp.com/b.gif?host=variety.com&#038;blog=43439658&#038;post=1201772501&#038;subd=pmcvariety&#038;ref=&#038;feed=1" width="1" height="1" /><div class="feedflare">
